caption.title: Herpes-simplex virus type-2 (HSV-2) prevalence by region.
caption.p: Black bars indicate regions with significantly higher prevalence than the reference category (Omaanda). MF = The Marienfluss; OZO = Ozosemo; OMAA = Omaanda; EHA = Ehama; OMUN = Omunjandu; OUTER = other regions and villages.
